messages.content:
Categorize this IT Ticket:

investigate newly disclosed kernel bug systems managed for other clients thursday february newly disclosed kernel hi two tickets ask investigate by other clients affected by newly disclosed kernel kernel gets patch against course ask patch apply affected kind regards information compliance officer extension
